name: MonkeyKing VR
description: "MonkeyKingVR" is a pioneer VR game made by GENE GAMES CORPORATION in the beginning of an era. "Journey to the West" as the background of the game; cartoon style; Classic tower defense as the core of the game play. This game focus on highlighting the immersive experience of virtual reality features.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win7 Win8 Win10 Processor: Intel I5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
